text: Tarapara nijedera angikara tadera bhanga karara daruna amara tadera bancita karalama ara tadera antarake kathina hate dilama. Tara kalamagulo tadera sthana theke sariye deya, ara tadera ye-saba nirdesa deya hayechila tara ansabisesa bhule yaya, ara tadera lokadera madhye bisbasaghatakata abiskara karara abasana tomara thakabe na tadera alpa chara, sejan'ya tadera ksama karo o upeksa karo. Nihsandeha allah bhalobasena satkarmidera.
